pullrequest.title: Added boolean, pass by reference value GetParam to PhysicsEngine

content.raw: In all of these cases, `bool GetParam` will already give an error message if it returns false. All physics engine implementations of this function call `PhysicsEngine::GetParam` if they can't find the parameter, and `PhysicsEngine` will return false and output a warning (#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1496/added-boolean-pass-by-reference-value/diff#Lgazebo/physics/PhysicsEngine.ccT250). I can change the gzwarn to a gzerr if you prefer, but I don't think another message needs to be added here.

I can change the gzwarn to a gzerr if you prefer, but I don't think another message needs to be added here.
